Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Applicable \Ap"pli*ca*ble\, a. [Cf. F. aplicable, fr. L. applicare. See {Apply}.] Capable of being applied; fit or suitable to be applied; having relevance; as, this observation is applicable to the case under consideration. -- {Ap"pli*ca*ble*ness}, n. -- {Ap"pli*ca*bly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
applicable adj 1: capable of being applied; having relevance; "gave applicable examples to support her argument" 2: readily applicable or practical [syn: {applicative}, {applicatory}]
